# web-framework-nextjs-app-router

Next.js 15 App Router patterns - file-based routing, Server/Client Components, streaming, Suspense, metadata API, parallel routes, Turbopack, async params

## Tags

`nextjs` `app-router` `server-components` `streaming` `suspense` `ssr` `ssg` `routing`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["web-framework-nextjs-app-router"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.
